Functions¶

airbnb_prediction.plotting.reg_subplots(dataframe, save=False, save_location='results/regression_plots.png')[source]¶

Plot regression plots of features vs target.

Parameters

  • dataframe (pd.DataFrame) – Airbnb data to plot.

  • save (bool, optional) – Whether to save figure to file, by default False

  • save_location (str, optional) – The save location of file.

Returns

Regression subplots.

Return type

seaborn.axisgrid.FacetGrid

airbnb_prediction.plotting.cv_results(dataframe, save=False, save_location='results/k_optimization_plot.png')[source]¶

Plot line chart of cross-validation results.

Parameters

  • dataframe (pd.DataFrame) – DataFrame of cross-validation results to plot.

  • save (bool, optional) – Whether to save figure to file, by default False

  • save_location (str, optional) – The save location of file.

Returns

Line chart of cross-validation results.

Return type

alt.Chart
